# [Interview #829: Robert Jordan's Next Series!, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=829#5)

#### Dragonmount

Any clues to what the title of the series means?

#### Robert Jordan

RAFO. Heh-heh. You didn't think I was going to abandon that, did you?
